Package com.telran.pizzaservice.service.exception

Class RestExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.telran.pizzaservice.service.exception.RestExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class RestExceptionHandler extends Object
Handles exceptions thrown by REST endpoints and returns appropriate HTTP response codes and error messages in the form of ProblemDetail objects. The following exceptions are handled by this class:
  • PizzaNotFoundException: Returns a 404 Not Found response with a ProblemDetail object containing information about the error.
  • PizzeriaNotFoundException: Returns a 404 Not Found response with a ProblemDetail object containing information about the error.
  • MethodArgumentNotValidException: Returns a 422 Unprocessable Entity response with a ProblemDetail object containing information about the error.
  • ConstraintViolationException: Returns a 400 Bad Request response with a ProblemDetail object containing information about the error.
Author:
Elena Ivanishcheva
